Name: Othokent
Traits: Hold Breath. Othokent can hold its breath for 15 minutes. Skewer. Once per turn, when Othokent makes a melee attack with its trident and hits, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) damage, and Othokent gains temporary hit points equal to the extra damage dealt.
Actions: Multiattack. Othokent makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws or trident or two melee attacks with its trident. Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage. Claws. Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) slashing damage. Trident. Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.
